attributes.additional_details: At present the Sinn Fein party, who are a republican party in the northern Ireland have got a number of seats in the house of commons. The government should ban Sinn Fein as they refuse to take their seats in the chamber, because they refuse to swear alliance, to the UK Monarch. They are wasting the electorates votes time and effort. The government should ask them to take their seats or hold a referendum on turning the UK into a Republic.
